Class MazeGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • MazeGame

  • public class MazeGame
extends java.lang.Object
    Class MazeGame is the Main class that runs the Maze Game. Creates a Maze object gameBoard which is used to run the game. Various public helper functions are called in the playGame() method to assist with running the game and interacting with the objects.
    Since:
    July 20, 2019

    • Method Detail

      • getLevel

        public static int getLevel()
        Method to get the level currently on on game
        Returns:
        Returns and integer representing the current level

      • setLevel

        public static void setLevel(int input)
        Method to set the level currently on on game. Used for debugging, and testing different levels.
        Parameters:
        input - the integer level between 1 and 4 inclusive to set the level to.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method to run the game.
        Parameters:
        args - the String array of command line arguments.

      • playGame

        public static void playGame()
        Play Game is the method that keeps track of the game input and sets key variables. Used to run the game.

      • setBoard

        public static void setBoard(Maze m)
        Sets up all the walls and items in the game depending on which level is selected.
        Parameters:
        m - A Maze object on which to operate.

      • printMap

        public static void printMap()
        Prints out a static map depicting the maze rooms depending on which level is selected.

      • printHelp

        public static void printHelp()
        Prints out a help menu to the console.

      • getUserInput

        public static java.lang.String getUserInput()
        Gets user input and stores it in a string to return.
        Returns:
        Returns as String object with the user input characters typed in at the keyboard on user prompt for input.

      • pressEnter

        public static void pressEnter()
        Stalls the program and waits for a user to Press Enter before continuing the program.

      • monsterWalk

        public static void monsterWalk(java.util.Random randGen,
                               Maze gameBoard)
        Randomly moves the monster either left,right,up or down.
        Parameters:
        randGen - A Random number generator.
        gameBoard - a Maze object that the game is running on.

      • displayMazeWraith

        public static void displayMazeWraith()
        Prints out an ASCII representation display of the Maze Wraith Monster.

        Controls the Fight Dialog and Output Durring a Fight Sequence.
        Parameters:

        Clears the console screen.
